attributes.action: demand that the Japanese government end the inhumane drive hunting of doplhins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Japanese government has chosen to ignore international conventions put in place to protect the worlds oceans by allowing the drive hunting of dolphins. Drive hunting is an incredibly cruel method of fishing where the dolphins are trapped, removed from the water and brutally hacked to death. We would like to see the Prime Minister put pressure on the Japanese government to put an end to this sadistic slaughter of a species that is under threat.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
